name: LD51 - 10 seconds to Shelter
description:
Description:

It's year 1B39 and you are stuck in your shelter after a barrage of nuclear bombs hit your city.

You must try and get out of the city while trying to survive until you can reach this goal (BEWARE!, there are falling nukes every 10 seconds).

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • E - Enter doors/shelter/etc.
  • F - Pick up item
  • Mouse - click on buttons in menu

Details:

  • Food and drink - you need one of each to survive until the next expedition outside
  • Wolfster - Energy drink that makes you faster physically and mentally (it feels like the time moves slower)
  • Pills - reduce radiation in your body
  • Bags - allows you to carry more items
  • Flare Gun - Allows you to call for a rescue helicopter (but it takes a while so you need some supplies)
  • Wheels, Battery, Controller - What to do with these? maybe build some toy car?

Disclaimers:

Used fonts:

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Rubik+Dirt

https://www.dafont.com/joystix.font
